Maryse Redbonnet:
I must kill them'I must kill them all! Huge mouth! Gigantic eyes! The rough sound of breathing! I Still rember everything... Right in front of me, it opened its mouth and swallowed my parents and grandma... Finally, it was about to lunge out and eat me! Then a Bounty Hunter appeared all of a sudden and saved my life...
If it wasn't for that stupid Bounty Hunter, I wouldn't have had to live like this... Everyone was killed! Only I survived' I should have been killed with my parents and grandma... Do you know how hard it is for a woman to live alone?! I will kill the wolves! I will kill them all!!! I will kill the wolves who took my happiness away!!!
